comments: In Mauriitus, French descendants use the last name before the surname as their given name, differently from other places where the first name is used.
examples: Dictyosperma album var. conjugatum H.E.Moore & J.Guého in Gentes Herb. (Ithaca): 12(1): 15 (1980). Syzygium mauritianum J.Guého & A.J.Scott in Kew Bull. 34(3): 493 (1980).
source: from D.J. Mabberley 'The Plant Book' (1987); Updates from R.W. Kiger, 26 Feb  1991. Obit. in Taxon, 58(2): 679 (2009); full name via the Mauritius Herbarium
